trans-unit.source: Provides a hint to the common language runtime (CLR) indicating how likely a dependency is to be loaded.

This class is used in a dependent assembly to indicate what hint should be used when the parent does not specify the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DependencyAttribute"></xref> attribute.
This attribute is used by the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) to generate native assembly images.
Apply the DefaultDependencyAttribute attribute to a dependent assembly to determine the preferred default binding.
A dependency that is likely to be loaded (<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.LoadHint>) will cause Ngen.exe to bind to that dependency.
Using this hint allows Ngen.exe to generate code that will result in a reduced working set and improved throughput but at the cost of always loading the dependency when the parent assembly is loaded.

When you apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DependencyAttribute> attribute to an assembly with a value of <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.LoadHint>, the native image generation service consults the dependent assembly for its preferred default binding, which is specified by the DefaultDependencyAttribute attribute.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DefaultDependencyAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.LoadHint"></xref> binding.
One of the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.LoadHint"></xref> values that indicates the default binding preference.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.LoadHint"></xref> value that indicates when an assembly loads a dependency.
Use this property to return the value of the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.LoadHint> enumeration used by the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DefaultDependencyAttribute> attribute.
